title: Growth & Retention: Why Subscription is the Holy Grail | Customer Basics with Salesforceâ€™s Tiffani Bova | E1311
description: This Startup Basics is all about growth & retention. Tiffani Bova from Salesforce joins to talk about how startups should measure customer health, the pitfalls of high churn, the best kind of growth, how to earn trust by saying "no" & more.
